description: Updates the specified properties of a given place index resource.

parameters.name: IndexName
parameters.description: The name of the place index resource to update.

parameters.name: DataSourceConfiguration
parameters.description: Updates the data storage option for the place index resource. IntendedUse (string) --- Specifies how the results of an operation will be stored by the caller. Valid values include: SingleUse specifies that the results won't be stored. Storage specifies that the result can be cached or stored in a database. Default value: SingleUse.

nested_params.name: IntendedUse
nested_params.description: Specifies how the results of an operation will be stored by the caller. Valid values include:

nested_items.name: IndexName
nested_items.description: The name of the updated place index resource.

nested_items.name: IndexArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the upated place index resource. Used to specify a resource across Amazon Web Services.

nested_items.name: UpdateTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp for when the place index resource was last updated in ISO 8601 format: YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sssZ.
